verses.plain: God is our refuge and strength, a very present help in trouble.

tokens.t: God
our refuge and strength, a very present help in trouble.

verses.plain: Therefore will not we fear, though the earth be removed, and though the mountains be carried into the midst of the sea;

tokens.t: Therefore will not we fear, though the earth be removed, and though the mountains be carried into the midst of the sea;

verses.plain: Though the waters thereof roar and be troubled, though the mountains shake with the swelling thereof. Selah.

tokens.t: the waters thereof roar
be troubled,
the mountains shake with the swelling thereof. Selah.

verses.plain: There is a river, the streams whereof shall make glad the city of God, the holy place of the tabernacles of the most High.

tokens.t: a river, the streams whereof shall make glad the city of God, the holy
of the tabernacles of the most High.

verses.plain: God is in the midst of her; she shall not be moved: God shall help her, and that right early.

tokens.t: God
in the midst of her; she shall not be moved: God shall help her,
right early.

verses.plain: The heathen raged, the kingdoms were moved: he uttered his voice, the earth melted.

tokens.t: The heathen raged, the kingdoms were moved: he uttered his voice, the earth melted.

verses.plain: The LORD of hosts is with us; the God of Jacob is our refuge. Selah.

tokens.t: The
of hosts
with us; the God of Jacob
our refuge. Selah.

verses.plain: Come, behold the works of the LORD, what desolations he hath made in the earth.

tokens.t: Come, behold the works of the
, what desolations he hath made in the earth.

verses.plain: He maketh wars to cease unto the end of the earth; he breaketh the bow, and cutteth the spear in sunder; he burneth the chariot in the fire.

tokens.t: He maketh wars to cease unto the end of the earth; he breaketh the bow, and cutteth the spear in sunder; he burneth the chariot in the fire.

verses.plain: Be still, and know that I am God: I will be exalted among the heathen, I will be exalted in the earth.

tokens.t: Be still, and know that I
God: I will be exalted among the heathen, I will be exalted in the earth.

verses.plain: The LORD of hosts is with us; the God of Jacob is our refuge. Selah.

tokens.t: The
of hosts
with us; the God of Jacob
our refuge. Selah.

footnotes.text: midst…: Heb. heart of the seas
and…: Heb. when the morning appeareth
our…: Heb. an high place for us
